actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health, Employment, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Health, Employment, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: To amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other purposes.
short_title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2013

summary.text: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2013 - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to require mediation and, if necessary, binding arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes.

titles.title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2013
To amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other purposes.
